text:
*Kameleoon is hiring a Managing Editor, North America* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

We're looking for a managing editor - someone as comfortable with story brief creation and project and calendar management, as they are writing an excellent thought leadership opinion piece - to join our new team in North America. We are aiming to build more of a magazine brand, not a blog. If you’re looking for a chance to build an influential digital publication in an industry that values everything from applied behavioral science and UX to management consulting, then this is it. Remote, full time work. 
 


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://www.linkedin.com/hiring/jobs/2429941241>

text:
*OneSignal is hiring a Content Specialist/Marketing Copywriter* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

- OneSignal is seeking a marketing copywriter to join the team to help produce a variety of content
- Responsible for crafting copy for blogs, case studies, ebooks, SEO-driven content, email copy, sale enablement materials, social media content, and more
- Requires 2+ years of hands-on experience creating acquisition and/or product marketing-focused content, ideally for a b2b SaaS product


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://onesignal.com/careers/347ba4c0-31a0-435c-af06-382c64b8759a>

<@>

*Shorthand is hiring a Freelancer Content Writer* :rocket:

*This is a freelance role.*

*What's the deal?* 

[Shorthand](<https://shorthand.com/>) is looking for freelance content writers to help build out a range of content, especially SEO / TOFU posts and educational guides. 

Our customers are content teams working in media, marketing, and communications, so experience writing for those sorts of personas would be handy. 

You’ll get extra points if you have experience writing for content teams in higher education, corporate communications, internal communications, finance, non-profits, and media/journalism. 

Your published work will look cool, as it’ll likely have some fancy scroll-based animation and will be built by our talented designer. [Here’s an example](<https://shorthand.com/the-craft/how-to-tell-stories-with-maps/index.html>).

Our marketing team is based in Australia and New Zealand, though you can be and work anywhere in the world. Get in touch with some writing samples (the more, the merrier), rates, and any relevant experience. 


*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:matt@shorthand.com|matt@shorthand.com>`
